rows.label: tlk70000042_05_msg0001
rows.name:
It's a shame, but I'm going
to close up shop here soon.

rows.label: tlk70000042_05_msg0002
rows.name:
There's no time or space to transport
the fish - I've got my hands full just
preparing to evacuate my own self!

rows.label: tlk70000042_05_msg0003
rows.name:
After all the effort you put
into helping me restock the
fish, it's hard to let go.

rows.label: tlk70000042_05_msg0004
rows.name: I'm not giving up forever, though!

rows.label: tlk70000042_05_msg0005
rows.name:
I believe that you can defeat the Holy
Grail. When that's happened, maybe
I'll take up raising fish again...
